raw_snippet: arXiv:2601.00004v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Depression is a major contributor to the mental-health burden in Nigeria, yet screening coverage remains limited due to low access to clinicians, stigma, and language barriers. title: Toward a Physical Theory of Intelligence

title: A multi-algorithm approach for operational human resources workload balancing in a last mile urban delivery system

title: Quantitative Rule-Based Strategy modeling in Classic Indian Rummy: A Metric Optimization Approach

title: The Agentic Leash: Extracting Causal Feedback Fuzzy Cognitive Maps with LLMs
raw_snippet: arXiv:2601.00097v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We design a large-language-model (LLM) agent that extracts causal feedback fuzzy cognitive maps (FCMs) from raw text. title: Mortar: Evolving Mechanics for Automatic Game Design
raw_snippet: arXiv:2601.00105v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present Mortar, a system for autonomously evolving game mechanics for automatic game design.
